fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Enchant a Coven member, They will be under the effect of the Necronomicon tonight.
- If you have the real Necronomicon, You may permanently consume it to convert a player into a random Coven role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - While you are alive, You may swap the Necronomicon around players at any given time.
